text:
@PiyushGoyal #India can add 20,000 #MBBS doctors and another 1,000 specialists with this single step, claims All India Foreign Medical Graduates Association ( @aifmga, ) a body of foreign-trained Indian doctors.

#doctors #coronavirus #healthcare 

I report for PTI 👇

https://t.co/DK6s08rW1k
